Body:
handler = JWTBearerTest(['xxx', 'yyy'], ['bbb'], [InMemoryKeyProvider({
    '001': private_rsa_1.public_key()})])
token = jwt.encode({'iss': 'xxx', 'aud': 'uuu', 'some': 'payload'},
    private_rsa_1, algorithm='RS256', headers={'kid': '001'})
with pytest.raises(InvalidAudienceError):
    await handler.authenticate({'access_token': token.decode()})
pytest.mark.asyncio
